data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 190,100 citizens of Makran, Baluchistan, Pakistan, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Makran, Baluchistan, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Makran, Baluchistan, Pakistan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Makran against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Makran, Baluchistan, Pakistan not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Baloch Rais people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Baloch Rais people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Baloch Rais people is yours.
Father, help 38 new simple churches start among the 190,100 people in the county of Makran, Baluchistan, Pakistan. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 190,100 people living in the county of Makran.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Makran, Baluchistan, Pakistan.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
